findings.description: Error object logged directly - may contain sensitive data or stack traces
findings.suggestion: Log only safe error properties (message, code). Sanitize error messages before displaying to users. Never expose stack traces in production.

Only request necessary permissions and explain usage to users

Disable cleartext traffic or use network security config to restrict it to specific domains

findings.description: Exported activity without permission protection - accessible by any app
findings.suggestion: Add android:permission attribute to exported activity or set android:exported="false" if external access is not needed.

findings.description: Permissive intent filter with android.intent.action.VIEW: Can be invoked by any app
findings.suggestion: Validate all incoming intents and restrict with custom permissions if external access is not required.

findings.description: Potentially excessive permissions declared: android.permission.CAMERA, android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
findings.suggestion: Review declared permissions and remove those not actively used. Request permissions at runtime only when needed.
